As a Security Analyst within an Enterprise Network, you detect abnormal outbound traffic from a user workstation. You must investigate the potential data exfiltration and contain the threat before it spreads.

As a Software Engineer using DevOps principles in a Cloud Infrastructure environment, a new deployment breaks the CI/CD pipeline due to a misconfigured environment variable. You must resolve it before the nightly build.

As a Security Analyst responsible for Cloud Infrastructure security, you discover a public S3 bucket exposing sensitive configuration files. You must act quickly to secure the bucket and rotate affected secrets.

As a Software Engineer following DevOps practices in an Enterprise Network, the deployment pipeline fails during artifact upload due to a proxy misconfiguration. You must troubleshoot and adjust the network policies.
